ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR(
AND( ISPICKVAL( Reader__r.Subscription_Type__c, "VIP"),Days_Of_Hold_Allowed__c > 365),
AND( ISPICKVAL( Reader__r.Subscription_Type__c, "Year"),Days_Of_Hold_Allowed__c > 61),
AND( ISPICKVAL( Reader__r.Subscription_Type__c, "Month"),Days_Of_Hold_Allowed__c > 61),
AND( ISPICKVAL( Reader__r.Subscription_Type__c, "One-time"),Days_Of_Hold_Allowed__c > 0) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No more than 2 months of rent are allowed. If Reader is VIP, no more than 1 year of rent is allowed. Also if Reader has "one-time" subscription, there is a restriction to take books home (only hall reader).
